column2: How often do you come across online content that feels useful or interesting to your studies or interests?
column3: Q2. Which platforms show you the most useful content?
column4: When you see something valuable online, what do you usually do first?
column5: How do you usually save content that you want to keep? (Select all that apply)
column6: On average, how many new items do you save in a week?
column7: Q6. How often do you open the section where your saved content is stored?

column9: How easy is it for you to find a specific item you’ve saved before?
column10: Where do you store most of your saved items?
column11: How would you describe your collection of saved items?
column12: When you look at your saved list, what best describes your reaction?
column13: When do you usually look through older content?
column14: What usually happens to the content you save over time?
column15: How helpful do you feel your current way of managing saved content is?
column16: What kind of feature would make it easier to handle saved items? (Select all that apply)
